title: How to Draw a Lotus Flower

steps.headline: Draw an oval with some dots inside it.
steps.description: This will be the seed pod.

steps.headline: Draw the first layer of petals surrounding the seed pod.
Draw the stamens around the seedpod.
Draw the second layer of petals.
Add some details by drawing 2-3 curved lines on the tip and base of the petals.
Draw some sepals at the base of the flower.
steps.description: Add two long, curved lines for the stem.
